metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19058 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Poppler 0.71.0. There is a reachable abort in Object.h, will lead to denial of service because EmbFile::save2 in FileSpec.cc lacks a stream check before saving an embedded file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19058` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.9').
